Event.Message: A Bluetooth policy has changed. Policy %1\%2 has value of: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PolicyPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PolicyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PolicyValue" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bluetooth radio enablement has been %3 due to policy %1\%2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PolicyPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PolicyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PolicyState" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bluetooth radio has %3 advertising due to policy %1\%2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PolicyPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PolicyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PolicyState" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bluetooth radio has %3 discoverability due to policy %1\%2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PolicyPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PolicyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PolicyState" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bluetooth radio has %3 radio name as %4 due to policy %1\%2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PolicyPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PolicyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PolicyState" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RadioName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Process %2 has attempted to pair to radio %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="BtAddr" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Service" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bluetooth has %1 service %2 on remote device %3 due to policy %4\%5...
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Accepted" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ServiceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="BtAddr" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="PolicyPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PolicyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bluetooth has %1 PSM %2 on remote device %3 due to policy %4\%5...
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Accepted" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Psm" inType="win:Int16" outType="xs:short"/> <data name="BtAddr" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="PolicyPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PolicyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: A connection to a remote device %1 was successfully established.
An attempt to connect to a remote device %1 failed.
The minimum encryption key size requirement of %2 octets was enforced on a connection to the remote device %1. The key size is %3 octets.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="bthAddr" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="requiredKeySize" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="actualKeySize" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>

Event.Message: A connection to the remote device %1 was rejected because it did not meet the minimum encryption key size requirement of %2 octets. The key size was %3 octets.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="bthAddr" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="requiredKeySize" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="actualKeySize" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> </template>
